mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tbl_user (user_id, user_ci, user_withdrew_datetime, user_is_service_blocked, user_is_active) VALUES
( #{item.userId}, #{item.userCi}, #{item.userWithdrewDatetime}, #{item.userIsServiceBlocked}, #{item.userIsActive} )

INSERT INTO tbl_helper (helper_id, helper_user_id, helper_ci, helper_name, helper_mobile, helper_dob, helper_gender, helper_accepted_datetime, helper_withdrew_datetime, helper_is_service_blocked, helper_is_active) VALUES
( #{item.helperId}, #{item.helperUserId}, #{item.helperCi}, #{item.helperName}, #{item.helperMoblie}, #{item.helperDob}, #{item.helperGender}, #{item.helperAcceptedDatetime}, #{item.helperWithdrewDatetime}, #{item.helperIsServiceBlocked}, #{item.helperIsActive} )

INSERT INTO tbl_helper_anyman_info (helper_anyman_helper_id, helper_anyman_ci, helper_anyman_user_id, helper_anyman_username, helper_anyman_profile_photo, helper_anyman_licenses, helper_anyman_experience) VALUES
( #{item.helperAnymanHelperId}, #{item.helperAnymanCi}, #{item.helperAnymanUserId}, #{item.helperAnymanUserName}, #{item.helperAnymanProfilePhoto}, #{item.helperAnymanLicenses}, #{item.helperAnymanExperience} )

INSERT INTO tbl_mission_info (mission_user_id, mission_id, mission_user_ci, mission_created_datetime, mission_saved_state, mission_type, mission_template, mission_content, mission_stopover, mission_destination, mission_completed_datetime, mission_bid_id, mission_helper_ci, mission_helper_id, mission_bid_amount, mission_fee) VALUES
( #{item.missionUserId}, #{item.missionId}, #{item.missionUserCi}, #{item.missionCreatedDatetime}, #{item.missionSavedState}, #{item.missionType}, #{item.missionTemplate}, #{item.missionContent}, #{item.missionStopover}, #{item.missionDestination}, #{item.missionCompletedDatetime}, #{item.missionBidId}, #{item.missionHelperCi}, #{item.missionHelperId}, #{item.missionBidAmount}, #{item.missionFee} )

INSERT INTO tbl_review_info (review_helper_id, review_helper_ci, review_bid_id, review_mission_type, review_mission_template, review_manner_score, review_perf_score, review_content, review_created_datetime) VALUES
( #{item.reviewHelperId}, #{item.reviewHelperCi}, #{item.reviewBidId}, #{item.reviewMissionType}, #{item.reviewMissionTemplate}, #{item.reviewMannerScore}, #{item.reviewPerfScore}, #{item.reviewContent}, #{item.reviewCreatedDatetime} )

INSERT INTO tbl_excelfiledata (company_Name, file_name, file_type, file_division,file_created_at, file_processed_at, file_size, uploader, operation_status, consequence, temp_file_name, temp_file_name_origin) VALUES(#{companyName}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{fileDivision},#{fileCreatedAt}, #{fileProcessedAt}, #{fileSize}, #{uploader}, #{operationStatus}, #{consequence}, #{tempFileName}, #{tempFileNameOrigin})
mapper.select: SELECT temp_file_name FROM tbl_excelfiledata WHERE operation_status = 'waiting'
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM tbl_excelfiledata WHERE file_name = #{fileName} AND temp_file_name IS NULL
SELECT temp_file_name FROM tbl_excelfiledata WHERE operation_status = 'sucessed'
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_excelfiledata SET operation_status = #{operationStatus}, file_processed_at = #{fileProcessedAt}, consequence = #{consequence}, totaldata_count = #{totaldataCount}, file_division = #{fileDivision} WHERE temp_file_name = #{tempFileName}
